definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: The nature of the stimulus may predispose some children to attention problems.
sentences.chinese: 刺激本身很可能使一些孩子易產生注意力問題。

sentences.english: Commodity money takes the form of a commodity with intrinsic value.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣本身即具備某種固有財貨的價值。

sentences.english: And Rinpoche has vowed to turn off the water while brushing his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 仁波切本身則誓言在刷牙時要關閉水龍頭。

sentences.english: In many countries, it also sets itself automatically to summer and winter time.
sentences.chinese: 在許多國家，它本身也設置自動夏季和冬季。

sentences.english: They depend on glacial melt for irrigation, but the glaciers are doomed.
sentences.chinese: 他們靠着冰川融水灌溉，但冰川本身被宣告了死刑。

sentences.english: You shouldn't have to do those things, the phone should just work.
sentences.chinese: 你沒必要做那些事情，那是手機本身就應該搞定的。

sentences.english: Blog membership must be managed from the group itself.
sentences.chinese: 博客成員關係必須由羣組本身管理。

sentences.english: We find ourselves lonely at the top.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現本身飛得越高，就會越感孤單。

sentences.english: A lot of them are actually English-as-a-Second-Language learners, but for Spanish, so.
sentences.chinese: 他們本身是西班牙人，英語是他們的第二語言。

sentences.english: The history of superstitious pratices can often help to explain them.
sentences.chinese: 迷信風俗的歷史往往可以用來解釋它本身。

sentences.english: Summery:Poetry is a kind of art of language, and also implies profound scientific spirits.
sentences.chinese: 詩歌是語言的藝術，其本身又蘊涵着深厚的科學精神。

sentences.english: Eva's wedding album holds only a faint glimmer of the wedding itself.
sentences.chinese: 埃娃的結婚相冊僅僅保存了婚禮本身闇弱的影像。

sentences.english: Water itself is vital to the future of the race.
sentences.chinese: 水本身就是人類未來的至關重要的因素。

sentences.english: But today, fox hunting itself is on the verge of becoming an endangered species.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在，獵狐活動本身就快成爲瀕臨絕種的東西了。

sentences.english: With an asynchronous model, the queue itself acts as a relief valve.
sentences.chinese: 藉助異步模型，隊列本身可以充當一個減壓閥。

sentences.english: The album itself sold over two-million copies and reached the Top 20.
sentences.chinese: 這張專輯本身的銷量超過兩百萬份，並達到前20名。

definition: in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to be in/to lie in/to consist in/to depend on/to rest with
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
